_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_: Allows interactive selection of a date range by providing two date fields to define 'From' and 'To' values.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ID_: An internal identifier used to create specific IDs for elements within the component.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_HTM: An alternative ID that overrides the default 'id' value in case specific HTML interactions are required.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_WID: Sets the width of the date picker component, accepts as a string or number, and influences the visual representation.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_MOD: Used to store and manage the selected date interval values within the component.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_DIS: Controls whether user interactions with the date picker area are possible or not.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_OPT: Contains configurable parameters and attributes that customize the behavior and appearance of the date picker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ID_: Provides a way to customize the ID attributes of component elements in case multiple instances exist on the same page.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_IS_: Flag to control visual error states or activate specific logic in error states within the component.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_EMIT_INP: Informs the parent element of changes in input values and transmits the current values of the date picker area.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_EMIT_CHA: Notifies the parent element when a final date selection has been made and sends the new data for further use or processing.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_EMIT_FOC: Informs the parent element when the date picker is focused, which can be useful for activating special UI states or executing specific logic.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_ID_WIDTH_DISABLED_DE: Customization of visual representation and control of accessibility for a versatile user experience.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_BASIC_DESCRIPTION_: Selection of dates with default values through the 'model' and 'input' props.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_OPTIONS_ERRORS_HTML_: Deep integration with advanced settings for optimal error handling and user interaction.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_EVENTS_DESCRIPTION_: Manages user events such as focus and input changes.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_MODEL_ID_PREFIX_IS_E: Controls error display and assigns IDs using 'idPrefix'.
